sentences.en: A faint smile of reminiscence appeared on her face..
sentences.cn: 一丝怀旧的微笑浮现在她的脸上。

sentences.en: A small, unobtrusive smile curved the cook's thin lips.
sentences.cn: 厨师的薄唇一弯，露出一丝不易察觉的微笑。

sentences.en: Haley studied her, an enigmatic smile on his face.
sentences.cn: 黑利打量着她，脸上带着神秘的笑容。

sentences.en: He fixed me with those luminous, empty eyes and his melancholy smile.
sentences.cn: 他笑容忧郁地凝视着我，闪亮的眼睛里空无一物。

sentences.en: He had a big smile on his face.
He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

sentences.en: He is entranced by the kindness of her smile.
sentences.cn: 他被她和善的微笑迷住了。

sentences.en: He smiled, an odd, dreamy smile that sent chills up my back.
sentences.cn: 他笑了，笑容古怪迷离，叫我后背发凉。

sentences.en: He tried hard not to smile in smug self-satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他强忍住沾沾自喜的笑容。

sentences.en: Relax, smile; loosen up in mind and body and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 放松，微笑。精神、身体和行为上都要放轻松。

sentences.en: She fancied he was trying to hide a smile.
sentences.cn: 她猜想他正在尽力掩饰笑容。

sentences.en: She gave him a bright, determined smile which seemed unnatural.
sentences.cn: 她对他开朗、坚定地一笑，但笑得有点不自然。

sentences.en: She handed the cigar back to Jason with a self-satisfied smile.
sentences.cn: 她得意地笑着把雪茄给贾森递了回去。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The luscious Miss Wharton gave me a demure but knowing smile.
sentences.cn: 性感迷人的沃顿小姐对我羞涩地会心一笑。

sentences.en: The maid looked at him, a nervous smile on her face.
sentences.cn: 女服务员看着他，脸上带着一丝局促不安的微笑。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)满面笑容（尤指与先前心情相对）
(非正式)从不幸中走出，愉快地面对未来
